description: SynthSeg is a tool for brain image segmentation.

input_image.title: Input image or folder
input_image.description: Image(s) to segment. Can be a path to an image or to a folder.

output_segmentation.title: Output segmentation
output_segmentation.description: Segmentation output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.

fast_prediction.title: Fast prediction flag
fast_prediction.description: Bypass some processing for faster prediction.

clip_ct.title: Clip CT scans flag
clip_ct.description: Clip CT scans in Hounsfield scale to [0, 80].

output_volume.title: Output volume file
output_volume.description: Output CSV file with volumes for all structures and subjects.

output_qc.title: Output quality control file
output_qc.description: Output CSV file with QC scores for all subjects.

output_posteriors.title: Output posteriors
output_posteriors.description: Posteriors output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.

resampled_images.title: Resampled images
resampled_images.description: Resampled image(s). Must be a folder if --i is a folder.

image_patch_size.title: Image patch size
image_patch_size.description: Only analyse an image patch of the given size.

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.

cpu.title: CPU execution flag
cpu.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.

photo_synthseg.title: Photo-SynthSeg mode
photo_synthseg.description: Photo-SynthSeg: segment 3D reconstructed stack of coronal dissection photos of the cerebrum; must be left, right, or both.
